## The map
### 2019-06-25

```{r map, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(lng = c(120.143898, 120.097363, 120.073278, 120.062834, 120.019759),
                 lat = c(30.250362,30.245871, 30.308249, 30.272572, 30.286888),
                 names = c("West Lake", "Lingyin Temple", "Zhejiang University", 
                           "Xixi National Wetland Park", "Alibaba"),
                 range = c(2.8, 0.9, 2.1, 4.4, 0.9))
df %>% leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers(popup = df$names) %>%
        addCircles(radius = df$range*500)

```
